description: Detects buffer overflow attempts in Unix system log files Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Buffer Overflow Attempts
query: (*attempt\ to\ execute\ code\ on\ stack\ by* OR *FTP\ LOGIN\ FROM\ .*\ 0bin0sh* OR *rpc.statd\[\\d\+\]\:\ gethostbyname\ error\ for* OR *AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA*)
